titleStmt.title: Vade mecum. = Goe vvith mee deare pietie, and rare charitie. VVhose flame is stirred vp, to dispell the cold out of the minde. By Otho Casmanne, preacher at Stoade. Translated out of Latine, by H.T. minister. The contents appeare in the page following.
Vade mecum. English
titleStmt.author: Casmann, Otto, d. 1607.
Tripp, Henry, d. 1612.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: A * ² A-P.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
